channel.title: Compiler. plz help
channel.description:
when i try to compile my server it says 'javac is not recognized as an internal or external command, operable program or batch file.
i know there is a simple fix for it just dont know what. please help =][br][br][size=1]Posted on: December 31, 2008, 03:22:20 pm[/size][hr]anyone?

item.title: Compiler. plz help
item.dc:creator: @Loore Loore
item.description:
@Loore wrote:

ok that makes since ill try it =][br][br][size=1]Posted on: December 31, 2008, 03:43:47 pm[/size][hr]ballin2005, i tryed that and now it says it ‘can not find the path specified’

edit. nvm im downloadin jdk i had jre i feel dumb…

Read full topic

item.title: Compiler. plz help
item.dc:creator: @ballin2005 ballin2005
item.description:
@ballin2005 wrote:

[code]@echo off
Title Compiler
“C:\Program Files\Java\jdk1.6.0_11\bin\javac.exe” *.java
pause
[\color]

Input your JDK’s version where the red color number is.
[/code]

Read full topic

item.title: Compiler. plz help
item.dc:creator: @miyu_miyu5 miyu miyu5
item.description:
@miyu_miyu5 wrote:

but this in it

code:@echo off
if exist “%programfiles%\Java” (call :compile “%programfiles%\Java”) else (goto error)
:compile
for /D %%x in ("%~1jdk*") do (set p="%%~x\bin\javac.exe")
if defined p (%p% -cp . *.java)
if defined p (goto end)
:error
echo You do not have Java installed. Please download it at the site that is about to load.
“%programfiles%\Internet Explorer\iexplore.exe” http://java.sun.com/javase/downloads/index.jsp
:end
echo Finished!
pause
exit

Read full topic
